channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- CF NFS volume release
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- CF NFS volume release

item.title: CVE-2019-11277|2024-08-04T22:48:09.059Z -- cloud%20foundry -- cf%20nfs%20volume%20release
item.description: Cloud Foundry NFS Volume Service, 1.7.x versions prior to 1.7.11 and 2.x versions prior to 2.3.0, is vulnerable to LDAP injection. A remote authenticated malicious space developer can potentially inject LDAP filters via service instance creation, facilitating the malicious space developer to deny service or perform a dictionary attack.
